summary: Timbuktu is an ancient city in Mali, Africa, known for its Islamic history and trade importance. It was a big center for learning and trade many centuries ago, especially during the Mali Empire. The city had a lot of scholars and was famous for its book trade. Over time, Timbuktu faced many changes in rule and a period of decline. Today, it's threatened by extremist groups, but people are working to protect its cultural heritage.
title: Timbuktu
